title: You really shouldn't be able to upvote or downvote without posting.
body:
Because honestly, people don't use upvotes and downvotes according to their purpose (increasing or decreasing visibility of comments/threads that are on or off topic), but instead, use it as a popularity contest.

The result of such a system, is that the Boards starts looking like an echo chamber, where rational arguments are downvoted, simply because they don't conform to what some ghost voters (at least that's what I call them) like.

If you want to downvote, or upvote for that matter, you should feel strongly enough about it that you can make a comment.
